sentences: On Friday afternoon, 14 June, Parties adopted the report of SBSTA- 16 (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.1).
Chair Thorgeirsson thanked delegates, his Co-Chairs and the Secretariat, and said he looked forward to seeing everyone again in New Delhi.
He gaveled the meeting to a close at 2:45 pm.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
